name: Language-Driven Multi-Robot Pathfinding and Obstacle Avoidance
description: This project explores language-driven multi-robot coordination for navigation and obstacle avoidance in the MuJoCo simulation environment. It extends the Robot-Collab framework to enable two ground robots to interpret high-level natural language instructions and translate them into structured subgoals.
goals: Build a 2D MuJoCo environment with obstacles and target zones.
Integrate two mobile robots for independent and cooperative navigation.
Connect to an LLM API for natural language task decomposition.
Implement inter-robot collision avoidance and coordination logic.
Visualize trajectories and performance metrics using matplotlib.
